title: Humane Nature; or, the Fundamental Elements of Policie
fulltitle: Humane Nature; or, the Fundamental Elements of Policie
comments: Humane Nature; or, The Fundamental Elements of Policie was first published in 1650. Our copytext is the posthumous edition of 1684, simply because a transcription of this edition happens to be available at EEBO-TCP.
copyright: This text is in the public domain.
